system.description: Using the Plane of Shadow, you can travel swiftly. You and any creature you touch are shifted to the Border Ethereal and travel to the border of the Plane of Shadow. You move at 50 miles per hour. You can take one creature per three caster levels. On the Plane of Shadow, you see in black and white only. You can exit the Plane of Shadow at any point. When the spell ends, you and your companions (or just you, if you were alone) are shunted to the Material Plane. The spell does not provide a way to return; you must find another means.
system.target: Up to one touched creature/3 levels
